Name: TypeOfApprovalReview
Description: A brief identification of the type of approval review such as IRB, ethical, compliance, etc. Supports the use of a controlled vocabulary.

Name: ReviewObjectReference
Description: Reference to an existing identifiable object using the Reference structure.  TypeOfObject should be set to any Versionable or Maintainable object.

Name: AgencyOrganizationReference
Description: Reference to an organization or individual, that provided the approval review. TypeOfObject should be set to Organization.

Name: ReviewerRole
Description: Role of the reviewing organization or individual. Supports the use of a controlled vocabulary.

Name: ReferenceIdentifier
Description: The reference or case identification of the review. Used to specify or track the case by the review organization

Name: Description
Description: Description of the approval review which can include requirements for the review, contents, or results.

Name: ApprovalReviewDocumentReference
Description: Link to a document related to the ethical review using the OtherMaterial structure.

Name: ApplicationDate
Description: Date materials submitted for approval review.

Name: ApprovalDate
Description: Date approval received from approval review organization.

Name: ApprovedPeriod
Description: Period for which the approval is valid. This may be a start date, and end date, or range specified as a start and end date.
